# Overview 
:::

The Mycoprotein Producer (MPP) Survey captures benchmark data from the mycoprotein sector. It includes both B2C and B2B producers of mycoprotein-based food ingredients and final products with distribution in supermarkets and foodservice.

Each quarter, the survey delivers valuable insights into the industryâ€™s status and outlook, providing essential information for policymakers, investors, and other stakeholders. For companies operating in the mycoprotein sector, this survey is an indispensable tool offering empirical guidance for strategic business planning.

This survey is made possible through funding from the European Union's [HORIZON EUROPE](https://research-and-innovation.ec.europa.eu/funding/funding-opportunities/funding-programmes-and-open-calls/horizon-europe_en) research and innovation programme under grant agreement [No 101059632](https://ec.europa.eu/info/funding-tenders/opportunities/portal/screen/opportunities/projects-details/43108390/101059632/HORIZON).
